TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Fin extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains the values of the FIN bit in the WebSocket data frame.

remarks.para: The Fin enumeration contains the values of the FIN bit defined in RFC 6455 for the WebSocket protocol.
The FIN bit indicates whether a WebSocket frame is the final fragment in a message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.Frame.Fin FINAL = unsigned int8(1)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 1. Indicates a final frame.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.Frame.Fin MORE = unsigned int8(0)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 0. Indicates that more frames follow.
